760250.name: MUKTI
760250.description:
Mukti is a first-person narrative adventure set within the immersive environment of an Indian museum.

Blurring the lines between game and cinema, Mukti delves deeply into a critical social issue that demands our attention: human trafficking. Through rich storytelling and immersive gameplay mechanics, Mukti invites players to confront the realities faced by victims and survivors alike, shedding light on this pressing global issue.

"PlayStation-Backed Indian Gaming Studio Casts Film Stars for Narrative Adventure ‘Mukti’" - Variety

"A journey of discovery, redemption, and the impact of hidden narratives." - PlayStation Blog

"Mukti game puts Indian stories on the world stage with gripping new trailer" - PCQuest

"Why Mukti Could Be the ‘Gone Home’ of Indian Gaming" - The Quest unlocked

"Sony's PS5 Indie Program Might Have Found Another Winner" - Push Square

"‘Mukti’ Brings India to the Forefront of the Adventure Genre in a Stunning New First-Person Title" - VICE

Launching on PlayStation 5 and PC, Mukti offers an impactful gaming experience that enlightens and empowers. Join us on this transformative journey to make a difference.
760250.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 韩语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 繁体中文, 印地语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
